parameter.name: randomSeed
parameter.displayName: Default Random Seed

parameter.name: OUTPUT_PATH
parameter.displayName: 000 -OUTPUT_PATH- Path in which data is written

parameter.name: ARQnull_OPT
parameter.displayName: 001 -ARQnull_OPTIMIZATION- Disable/Enable pull when a node is created

parameter.name: HANDLE_ARQ_OPT
parameter.displayName: 002 -HANDLE_ARQ_OPTIMIZATION- Disable/Enable send of newer messages when an old message is requested

parameter.name: MEAN_CREATE
parameter.displayName: 100 -MEAN_CREATE- Avg. time between the creation of two nodes using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_CREATE
parameter.displayName: 101 -VAR_CREATE- Std. dev of the time between the creation of two nodes using a normal distribution

parameter.name: MEAN_KILL
parameter.displayName: 102 -MEAN_KILL- Avg. time between the removal of a two nodes using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_KILL
parameter.displayName: 103 -VAR_KILL- Std. dev of the time between the removal of two nodes using a normal distribution

parameter.name: MEAN_BROADCAST_EVENT
parameter.displayName: 104 -MEAN_BROADCAST_EVENT- Avg. time between the creation of two broadcasted events using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_BROADCAST_EVENT
parameter.displayName: 105 -VAR_BROADCAST_EVENT- Std. dev of the time between the creation of two broadcasted events using a normal distribution

parameter.name: MEAN_MULTICAST_EVENT
parameter.displayName: 106 -MEAN_MULTICAST_EVENT- Avg. time between the creation of two multicasted events using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_MULTICAST_EVENT
parameter.displayName: 107 -VAR_MULTICAST_EVENT- Std. dev of the time between the creation of two multicasted events using a normal distribution

parameter.name: MEAN_UNICAST_EVENT
parameter.displayName: 108 -MEAN_UNICAST_EVENT- Avg. time between the creation of two unicast events using a normal distribution, use 0 to disable

parameter.name: VAR_UNICAST_EVENT
parameter.displayName: 109 -VAR_UNICAST_EVENT- Std. dev of the time between the creation of two unicast events using a normal distribution

parameter.name: INITIAL_NODE_SIZE
parameter.displayName: 110 -INITIAL_NODE_SIZE- Size of the network at time 0

parameter.name: MAX_NODE_SIZE
parameter.displayName: 111 -MAX_NODE_SIZE- Maximum number of nodes allowed in the network

parameter.name: TOPIC_NUM
parameter.displayName: 112 -TOPIC_NUM- Maximum number of topics

parameter.name: STOP_TIME
parameter.displayName: 113 -STOP_TIME- Time at which to automatically stop the simulation

parameter.name: PROPAGATION_SPEED
parameter.displayName: 200 -PROPAGATION_SPEED- Speed of propagation of the perturbation

parameter.name: BITRATE
parameter.displayName: 201 -BITRATE- Bitrate in kbps (PACKET_SIZE/BITRATE is the actual needed to transmit a single packet)

parameter.name: PROCESSING_DELAY
parameter.displayName: 202 -PROCESSING_DELAY- Mean delay needed to process and then retransmit a packet

parameter.name: MAX_RANDOM_DELAY
parameter.displayName: 203 -MAX_RANDOM_DELAY- maximum random delay before sending (using uniform distribution)

parameter.name: NORMAL_DIST
parameter.displayName: 204 -NORMAL_DIST- Reference distance for packet loss model

parameter.name: CUT_OFF
parameter.displayName: 205 -CUT_OFF- Cut off distance in NORMAL_DIST*x after which no interference or reception can happen

parameter.name: SNR
parameter.displayName: 206 -SNR- Base signal to noise ratio

parameter.name: VAR_NOISE
parameter.displayName: 207 -VAR_NOISE- Std. dev of the random noise

parameter.name: PACKET_SIZE
parameter.displayName: 208 -PACKET_SIZE- Size of the packets, this influences both transmission time and packet loss

parameter.name: DEBUG_COLLISIONS
parameter.displayName: 209 -DEBUG_COLLISIONS- Disable/Enable output for detected collisions

parameter.name: ARQ_INTERVAL
parameter.displayName: 300 -ARQ_INTERVAL- Interval after which a new ARQ is triggered

parameter.name: DISPLAY_SIZE
parameter.displayName: 400 -DISPLAY_SIZE- Size of the display
